amendment.description: Amendment allows the Secretary of State to access previously appropriated funds to cover the costs for evacuating citizens from Lebanon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wolf amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Wolf.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Wolf amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wolf amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
